title: What’s the Most Memorable Cigar You Ever Smoked? - The After Show
itunes:title: What’s the Most Memorable Cigar You Ever Smoked? - The After Show
description:
What makes a cigar memorable? Each of us discloses the most memorable cigar we ever smoked. We also try a mystery cigar. Could this become our most memorable cigar?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
